attributes.action: Open Fabric nightclub and protect it from future closure.
attributes.background: Someone died whilst taking drugs in there. It was the individuals choice to take drugs so why should thousands of musicians, artists, club goers and many other people suffer and miss out from having the best  and inspirational nightclub shut down due to some incompetent drug taker.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The decision to close Fabric Nightclub appears to be one taken by Islington Council.

You could raise this issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You could also petition Islington Council - you can find out more here:

http://democracy.islington.gov.uk/mgEPetitionListDisplay.aspx?bcr=1
